item.description:
This will be a very good way to see and experience lots of really strong artists in one building.  Let's meet there and experience the art together. After our tour, we'll go to cafe' or restaurant nearby to chat about the best artists that we saw.

Best of Newton Juried Art Fest!
Sat.Nov. 3

All at One Location:

The Newton Cultural Center, 225 Nevada St, Newtonville. Directions. In the Nonantum neighborhood of Newton (North of the Mass Turnpike)


See Accepted Artists and Artist Pages for the 77 artists in the show.

This year, by instituting a Salon Exhibit alongside the booth exhibits, We have doubled the number of artists in the fall juried show! A new and spacious floor-plan will ensure a delightful viewing and shopping experience.

This was such a tremendously strong field of applications – many many thanks to Paula Tognarelli, director of the griffin museum of photography for her thoughtful jurying.
item.name: Best of Newton Juried Art Fest
